name: GelutKuy v1.0 Beta
description:
GelutKuy is a Battle Card Game 2 player based on Indonesia Hero Story.

This is only Digital Prototyping (Early access) not a complete ready to play product. But 90% of the functionality is ready to play.

Created by Team GelutKuy 2018
